figure.head: Figure 1:
figure.figDesc:
(a) Simulated and (b) measured spectra for a coupled dot-cavity system in the strong-coupling
regime for different cavity wavelengths. The arrows indicates the magic frequency where the biexciton-to-
exciton transition is in resonance with two cavity photons and luminescence becomes quenched. Panel (c)
reports the level scheme under consideration.
